text: Their drink offerings shall be half a hin of wine 28:14 Half a hin is approximately 1.9 quarts or 1.8 liters of wine. with each bull, a third of a hin 28:14 A third of a hin is approximately 1.3 quarts or 1.2 liters of wine. with the ram, and a quarter hin with each lamb. This is the monthly burnt offering to be made at each new moon throughout the year.
